ygData.subject: Re: Phobia
ygData.msgSnippet: It doesn t have to destroy the planet, enough shots like that will turn this into a lifeless planet. and without life forms the Autobots and Decepticons

"It doesn't have to destroy the planet, enough shots like that will 
turn this into a lifeless planet. and without life forms the Autobots 
and Decepticons wouldn't have adapted and been reformed."

Phobia wondered if Kluster was having second thoughts about thier 
agreement. If Kluster realized that Phobia didn't care about the 
planet, the Maximals, the predacons,as long as his  creation still 
existed.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Kluster::
> 
> Kluster shakes his head. "Actually, I havn't," he says, "The 
weapons of 
> theirs that we had scanned did not have the power nessesary to 
destroy a 
> planet."
